message: I understand you wanting a larger share, but the value decreases for me each round.  This is a fair offer considering the circumstances.
Considering your loss to inflation, this is a reasonable adjustment
I'm willing to compromise, but time is running out. This is my final offer.
You said that was your final offer, but I'm willing to meet you closer to the middle
Alice, it seems like you're trying to squeeze me for every penny.  This is a serious offer, and the value is rapidly decreasing for me with each round. I urge you to accept.
